Check Disbursement Bank Account and Payment Document mapping

If printed checks: confirm layout/template and numbering range

title: AP invoice not send to approver or reject again
rca: Payment Process Profile (PPP) configuration mismatch (payment method/document/bank account or transmission/format not aligned).
prechecks: Confirm PPR parameters: Payment Method, Pay Through Date, Pay Group
Open PPP and verify: enabled payment method, effective dates, BU assignment
Check Disbursement Bank Account and Payment Document mapping
If transmitting files: verify Payment System/Account and endpoint credentials
If printed checks: confirm layout/template and numbering range
steps: Enable the required payment method and set correct effective dates on PPP
Map PPP to the correct BU, disbursement bank account, and payment document
If bank file: select appropriate Format/Layout and parameters; test with sample
If SFTP: update host/port/key; test connection from PPP Transmission
Rebuild/Transmit payments and review Payment Files log
validation: PPR selects invoices using the intended PPP
Payment file/printed checks generated; transmission/print completes without error

rca: Payment Document not created for the legal entity/disbursement bank account or not active.
prechecks: Navigate: Manage Payment Documents; search by legal entity and bank account
Verify next available document number range and status
steps: Create/activate Payment Document; assign to bank account
Return to PPP and select document; save
validation: PPP saves with document; PPR generates numbered payments

title: Payment file transmission fails: No payment system configured on PPP
rca: PPP lacks Payment System / Payment System Account mapping for the format.
prechecks: Open PPP → Transmission
Check Payment System and Account; confirm external URL/credentials exist
steps: Create Payment System & Account for the format
Map them on PPP; test connection using sample file

title: Payment format not applied: Formatting program not linked
rca: PPP doesn't reference the intended format program (XML Publisher template).
prechecks: Review PPP → Formatting; format, layout, and language
Open the BIP template; confirm template code/version
steps: Select correct Format and Layout on PPP; set Default
Republish BIP template if version changed
validation: Payment file generated with expected schema

title: Supplier bank account rejected: Validation failure for IBAN/branch
rca: Bank/branch or IBAN validation rules mismatch with country setup; supplier account not validated.
prechecks: Check Supplier Site payment method and bank account status
Confirm Country-specific bank/branch configuration and checksum rules
steps: Correct supplier bank details; re-validate account
If using SEPA, ensure IBAN/BIC populated and country supports format
validation: Payment passes validation; supplier included in PPR

title: PPP does not appear for BU: Data access / security
rca: User lacks data access to the BU or cash management access to bank account.
prechecks: Check roles: Payables Manager, Cash Management access
Review data access sets for BU and bank account
steps: Grant BU data access; add bank account access role
validation: PPP visible for BU during PPR selection

title: Duplicate numbering detected during posting
rca: Payment Document number range overlaps or Next Number not updated after migration.
prechecks: Check Payment Document current number vs. issued numbers
Confirm no overlap across PPPs using same document
steps: Adjust Next Available Number; correct overlap by renumbering or voiding

title: Remit-to bank not derived for foreign currency
rca: PPP or Payment Document restricted to specific currencies; supplier allows only local currency.
prechecks: Check PPP currency restrictions
Review Payment Document / Bank Account currency
Verify Supplier Site payment currency
steps: Loosen PPP/document currency restriction or add multi-currency document
Update supplier to accept required currency
validation: PPR selects invoices and builds file

title: Error 'No payments formatted' after build
rca: PPP formatting required parameter not set or template locale mismatch.
prechecks: Open BIP Layout; verify locale and parameter list
Review PPP Formatting → parameter mapping
steps: Set default locale on PPP Layout
validation: Payment file appears in Payment Files tab

title: SFTP transmission error: key/port mismatch
rca: Payment System Account uses wrong port, host key, or authentication method.
prechecks: Test sftp from PPP Transmission configuration
Confirm port, username, and public key with bank
steps: Upload correct public key; update port/host
validation: Payment file delivered to bank SFTP

title: Bank account not available when creating PPP
rca: Cash Management bank account not enabled for Payables or not a disbursement account.
prechecks: Navigate: Manage Bank Accounts; search account
Check Use for Payables = Yes; Account Purpose = Disbursement
steps: Enable Payables usage and Disbursement purpose
Return to PPP and select the bank account

title: Check stock alignment issue (MICR/layout)
rca: PPP uses wrong printer settings or check template geometry differs from stock.
prechecks: Print sample from BIP with current layout
Measure margins and MICR line; verify printer PCL/PS mode
steps: Adjust BIP template margins; use bank-approved MICR font
validation: Check print aligns; bank clears test items

title: SEPA pain.001 rejected by bank
rca: PPP uses wrong SEPA version or missing BIC/IBAN mapping.
prechecks: Validate supplier IBAN/BIC; payer BIC
Confirm PPP format version (e.g., pain.001.001.03 vs .06)
steps: Switch PPP to required pain.001 version
Populate mandatory tags in template mapping

title: Positive Pay not generated
rca: PPP Positive Pay program not scheduled or account not mapped.
prechecks: Check PPP Positive Pay tab / program assignment
Verify bank account mapping and schedule
steps: Assign Positive Pay program; set schedule after payment creation
validation: Positive Pay file delivered to bank

title: PPR ignores scheduled payments due to installment criteria
rca: PPP selection criteria or PPR parameters exclude installments (e.g., pay through date, min/max amounts).
prechecks: Review PPR parameters: Pay Through Date, Pay Group, Min/Max
Check PPP selection rules if used
steps: Align parameters with business rules; remove restrictive criteria

title: [DRAFT] AR AutoInvoice: Supplemental pattern #20000
rca: Supplemental placeholder for AutoInvoice in AR.
prechecks: Confirm setup
Check data access
Review effective dates

title: [DRAFT] AP Invoices: Supplemental pattern #20001
rca: Supplemental placeholder for Invoices in AP.
prechecks: Confirm setup
Check data access
Review effective dates

title: [DRAFT] FA Assets: Supplemental pattern #20002
rca: Supplemental placeholder for Assets in FA.
prechecks: Confirm setup
Check data access
Review effective dates

title: [DRAFT] GL Journals: Supplemental pattern #20005
rca: Supplemental placeholder for Journals in GL.
prechecks: Confirm setup
Check data access
Review effective dates

title: [DRAFT] FA Assets: Supplemental pattern #20114
rca: Supplemental placeholder for Assets in FA.
prechecks: Confirm setup
Check data access
Review effective dates

title: AP invoice import errors with tax calculation disabled
rca: Supplier Site tax options misconfigured; Term Date Basis mismatch.
prechecks: Verify Supplier Site Invoicing options
Check Tax Regime subscription and party tax profiles
steps: Ensure Supplier/Party Tax Profile has correct tax classification codes

title: GL journal cannot be posted due to sequencing assignment period mismatch
rca: Primary sequencing assignment effective start date set to next fiscal year.
prechecks: Review Sequencing Assignments effective dates
Confirm period status and journal source/category
validation: Journal posts with sequence number from prior FY assignment

title: AR AutoInvoice rejects lines due to missing accounting rule
rca: Transaction type requires accounting rule but rule is not provided on source lines.
prechecks: Check Transaction Type settings
Review source mapping for rule id/name
steps: Update Transaction Type to optional rule OR provide rule on sources
